==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Attrition
|desc_1      = Some of the Lord of Eroded Primal Fire's attacks (indicated by dark purple color) inflict stacks of Attrition on hit. The amount of stacks inflicted depends on the attack. If no more stacks are accumulated after 0.5 seconds, the active character will lose [[HP]] equal to '''1% Max HP + 50''' for each stack accumulated.

|name_2      = Void Ward
|desc_2      = During some attacks, the Lord of Eroded Primal Fire or its summoned objects will gain a [[Void Ward]] which grants immunity to DMG until destroyed. Depending on the ability, the Void Ward will have different amounts of durability. The durability will reduce by '''1''' when hit by an Elemental attack, or '''3''' when hit by a [[Nightsoul]]-aligned attack.

|name_3      = Burnt Ground
|desc_3      = Some of the Lord of Eroded Primal Fire's attacks will leave the struck area burning. Depending on the type of attack that causes the burning ground, it will inflict the following effects once every '''0.5s''' to characters within the area:
* '''{{Color|Pyro}}:''' Deals '''10% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}}.
* '''Abyssal Flame:''' Deals '''5% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicts '''2''' stacks of '''Attrition'''.

|name_4      = Single Slash
|desc_4      = Phase 1 only. Lunges towards the player and slashes once, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} and leaving the ground burnt.

|name_5      = Double Slash
|desc_5      = Phase 1 only. Slashes twice in an arc in front of itself, dealing '''30% ATK''', '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} and leaving the ground burnt.

|name_6      = Downward Cleave
|desc_6      = Phase 1 only. Raises its sword high and cleaves downwards, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} and leaves the ground burnt.

|name_7      = Abyssal Orbs
|desc_7      = Phase 1 only. Forms 4 large orbs of abyssal flame and sends them flying towards the player in succession. Upon impact, the orb deals '''40% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicts '''10''' stacks of '''Attrition'''. Always followed by '''Downward Cleave'''.

|name_8      = Wave Blast
|desc_8      = Phase 1 only. Inserts its sword into the ground and gains a '''Void Ward''' with '''50''' durability. Repeatedly releases waves of flames that expand outwards, dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} on hit.<br><br>Afterwards, launches a large orb of abyssal flame at the player. Once it lands, it will briefly [[Vacuum Field|pull]] nearby players towards it, then explodes, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}, inflicting '''30''' stacks of '''Attrition''', and leaving the ground burnt.<br><br>If the Void Ward is destroyed, the attack will be interrupted, and the Lord of Eroded Primal Fire will lose '''10%''' of its Max HP and become paralyzed for a period of time.

|name_9      = Summon Tenebrous Mimiflora
|desc_9      = Phase 1 only. Engulfs the arena in a dark fog which greatly reduces visibility. Summons 3 [[Tenebrous Mimiflora]] to attack the player. Each Tenebrous Mimiflora has a '''Void Ward''' with '''3''' durability. The fog will clear whenever [[Mavuika]], [[Citlali]], or [[Pyro Traveler]] is on the field and is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state. After some time, marks an area under the player where a large hand will emerge from the ground, dealing '''30% ATK''', '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''20''', '''30''' stacks of '''Attrition''' on hit.<br><br>If the Tenebrous Mimiflora are all defeated, the attack will be interrupted, and the Lord of Eroded Primal Fire will lose '''10%''' of its Max HP and become paralyzed for a period of time.
|file_9_2    = Lord of Eroded Primal Fire Summon Tenebrous Mimiflora 2
|caption_9_2 = Follow-Up

|name_10      = Abyssal Rain
|desc_10      = Summons abyssal flames to rain down in random locations across the arena, each dealing '''15% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''5''' stacks of '''Attrition''' on hit. After a few seconds, larger meteorites will also fall amidst the rain, each dealing '''35% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''15''' stacks of '''Attrition''' on hit.<br><br>Afterwards, raises its sword for a massive downward cleave, which deals '''120% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} and cause part of the arena to fall, reducing the player's available space.<br><br>After using this attack for the first time, the Lord of Eroded Primal Fire will enter Phase 2 and unlock additional attacks.<br><br>This attack can only be used for a total of 3 times.<br><br>If the player falls with the floor, they will be teleported back to the center, but the active character will lose '''80%''' of their Max HP.

|name_11      = Dual Sword Blast
|desc_11      = Phase 2 only. Plunges its dual swords into the ground and causes a quake in a straight line forward. For both the initial plunge and the quake, the Pyro sword deals '''25% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} and the abyssal sword deals '''25% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicts '''5''' stacks of '''Attrition'''. Afterwards, fires a beam of abyssal energy from its mouth and sweeps the area in front of itself. On contact, the beam deals '''50''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicts '''5''' stacks of '''Attrition'''.

|name_12      = Dual Sword Slash
|desc_12      = Phase 2 only. Slashes first with its Pyro sword, then with its abyssal sword, then both swords at the same time. Each slash deals '''25% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} or {{Color|Physical DMG}}, leaves the ground burnt, and sends forward a wave of matching type that deals '''15% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} or {{Color|Physical DMG}}. Physical hits from this attack additionally inflict '''10''' stacks of '''Attrition'''.

|name_13      = Darkscale Shower
|desc_13      = Phase 2 only. Fires a barrage of scales that land in front of itself, each dealing '''15% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''5''' stacks of '''Attrition''' on hit.

|name_14      = Cloudform
|desc_14      = Phase 2 only. Performs 2 lunging slashes, first with its abyssal sword, dealing '''25% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''20''' stacks of '''Attrition''', then with its Pyro sword, dealing '''45% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}}. Afterwards, transforms into a thundercloud and circles around the arena, causing eruptions in random locations, dealing '''15% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''10''' stacks of '''Attrition''' on hit. Finally, emerges from the cloud and repeats the 2 lunging slashes.

|name_15      = Annihilate
|desc_15      = Phase 2 only. Gains a '''Void Ward''' with '''40''' durability and begins channeling immense abyssal energy. When charging completes, releases a massive blast across the arena, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''30''' stacks of '''Attrition'''.<br><br>If the Void Ward is destroyed, the attack will be interrupted, and the Lord of Eroded Primal Fire will lose '''10%''' of its Max HP and become paralyzed for a period of time.

|name_16      = Starscourge
|desc_16      = Phase 2 only. Spawns a vortex that pulls the player towards the center of the arena while dealing '''10% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} every '''0.5s'''. Afterwards, spawns 3 Nightsoul Totems around the player, forming a circular area that the player cannot exit. While the totems are intact, periodically deals '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} to trapped players and inflicts '''10''' stacks of '''Attrition'''.<br><br>The totems each possess a '''Void Ward''' with '''24''' durability. Destroying all totems will interrupt this attack.<br><br>If the totems are not destroyed in time, the Lord of Eroded Primal Fire transforms into a massive meteor that crashes down to the arena from high above, deailng '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''60''' stacks of '''Attrition''' to all players in the arena.<br><br>This attack is only used once per battle.<br><br>If the totems are all destroyed, the attack will be interrupted, and the Lord of Eroded Primal Fire will lose '''10%''' of its Max HP and become paralyzed for a period of time.
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A fell [[dragon]], congealed from the power of pitch-black darkness.|[[Archive]], before {{Quest|When All Becomes a Monument}}}}
{{Description|A fell dragon, congealed from the power of pitch-black darkness.<br>A monster of the void, known as both the Reaper of the [[Abyss]] and "[[Gosoythoth]]." It is able to corrupt memories contained within the [[ley line]]s of the earth, congealing them into tangible forces of catastrophic portent. From these memories that since time immemorial have flowed below the land, it has managed to extract the remnant will of a [[Xiuhcoatl|primordial elemental dragon sovereign]], drawing it out like marrow to repurpose as the foundation of its own fabricated image.<br>But is it truly a mere "image"? Brought back by the very otherworldly forces it had once resisted, a once-dead dragon opens its eyes anew, forsaking all in this brief dream of a resurrection. Trapped perpetually in the final day of its existence by this pitch-black gospel, its boundless fury has consumed all reason. Now, what remains is its unrelenting lust for battle, burning on without end.|[[Archive]], after {{Quest|When All Becomes a Monument}}}}

==Trivia==
*This boss is the first Weekly Boss to have unique player downed lines specific to multiple [[Playable Character]]s.
*In both the weekly challenge and the domain in {{Quest|Where All Hopes Lie|showType=0}}, this boss speaks in the voices of previous [[Pyro Archon]]s. 
**The reason for this has not been addressed in-game, but it could be that Gosoythoth extracted the memories of these Pyro Archons from the Ley Lines in addition to Xiuhcoatl's memories.
**It could also be a display of power and intimidation, as the more power an Abyss creature holds, the more powerful creatures it is able to imitate.<ref>YouTube: [https://youtu.be/8XuME9bKqBs Genshin Impact Version 5.3 Special Program]</ref><!-- needs timestamp --> This would also explain why it took the form of a [[Dragon Sovereign]].
**Additionally, as all these voice lines have themes of failure and hopelessness, it could be attempting to demoralize Mavuika by reminding her that none of her predecessors were able to fully drive out the Abyss from Natlan.
